thread.title: Executech Announces Purchase of IT Service Clients From Max Technology

author: cnbc.com
title: Executech Announces Purchase of IT Service Clients From Max Technology
text:
Award-Winning IT Service Provider to Expand Services In Rural Utah Communities
SOUTH JORDAN, Utah--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Executech, an award-winning IT services provider , has completed their purchase of the IT service clients of Max Technology, a technology company based in Carbon County, Utah. The purchase of these clients will help Executech grow its footprint in the rural communities of Utah.
For many years, Executech has serviced rural businesses and communities in the Cedar Valley and St. George areas with quality IT support. Executech will now expand its services to new and existing clients in the Carbon County area and surrounding regions.
“Executech has always been about making technology work for small businesses. Our neighbors in rural communities are no exception,” said Eric Montague, President of Executech. “We look forward to serving the clients of Max Technology with exceptional service and support for their technology.”
The purchase of Max Technology’s clients was a collaborative effort and is a reflection of Executech’s goal of expanding its services and footprint across the Intermountain West. Executech recently announced the acquisition of Red Rock IT, a remote IT support provider, as part of this goal.
About Executech
Executech ( www.executech.com ) is Utah’s premier IT services provider. Founded in 1999, Executech provides enterprise-quality IT to small and medium-sized organizations across the Intermountain West. Executech is defined by its people, and every technician serves clients onsite and is available 24/7/365. With no contracts or commitments, Executech’s success is dependent on providing its clients with superior customer service. For every need and any situation, Executech is an elite partner in delivering the best IT services, products, and support.
